name: wasm-cpp-base
description: Basic set up for compiling and running C++ wasm code

scripts.build: mkdir -p build; em++ src/main.cpp src/add.cpp -o build/main.js -O2 -s EXPORTED_FUNCTIONS=_add -s EXPORTED_RUNTIME_METHODS=ccall,cwrap && cp src/*.html src/*.js src/*.css build/
scripts.start: npm run build && npm run serve
